description: Create a matrix of 0’s and inject into it a matrix of 1’s.
source:
def numpy1():
  zeros = NEWMAT(10,11)
  ones = NEWMAT(2,3)
  ones += 1
  #PRX(zeros)
  #PRX(ones)
  ones[0,1] = 99
  ones[1,1] = 98
  #PRX(ones)
  zeros[2:4, 5:8] = ones
  #PRX(zeros)

  # Visualize as pixels :-)
  CLLCD()
  for row in range(1,10):  # todo - should be 0,10 
    for col in range(1,11):
      if zeros[row, col] == 0:
        PIXEL(row, col)
title: Matrix Injection
